description: Complete system overview documenting the judicial analytics platform architecture, key components, and high-level data flows between major subsystems
Comprehensive documentation of the core data models including judges, courts, cases, jurisdictions, and their relationships, with ERD diagrams and field specifications
Detailed documentation of the judicial bias detection algorithms, including the 6-category pattern analysis system, confidence scoring, and normalization methods
Technical specifications for the case distribution and redistribution algorithms, including workload balancing, jurisdiction rules, and assignment optimization
Documentation of the legal advertising system including slot management, tiered pricing models, rotation rules, and compliance requirements
Detailed documentation of the multi-source data synchronization system, including CourtListener integration, update prioritization, and consistency management
